dmca.title: Setting the Wrong Tone?
dmca.body:
>  -----Original Message-----
> From: [Sender]
> Sent:	Wednesday, November 12, 2003 3:03 PM
> To:	[Recipient]
> Cc:	
> Subject:	DataDink Content Theft and Trademark Infringement
>
> To whom it may concern,
>
> We have noticed that you have flagrantly stolen content and use of the
> Moan tone trademark from Inhand Mobile Entertainment.  This information is
> also being presented to users under the Sprint PCS forum that they may get
> our content for free..  We have reported this information to the
> moderators at Sprint and will take all necessary measures to have you
> cease and desist this activity.  We have also contacted PayPal and have
> informed them that you are currently selling stolen content.
>
> Should the information not be removed from your site immediately then you
> will be formally contacted by our attorneys and we will prosecute to the
> fullest extent of the law.
>
> Regards,
>
> Inhand Mobile Entertainment
